column5: Hey all, I'm heading up to Arrowhead Provincail Park with the wife and kids this weekend.  All indications are that the fishing is ok but not great.  I'm told the main lake has bass and the smaller lake (Mayflower) has rainbows and possibly specks, although I'm not holding my breath.  We'll have a canoe and lots of energy.  Any hints on how to make this a great weekend (fishing or otherwise) would be greatly appreciated.  Thanks in advance. T

Don't bother with the small lake. The trout will all be deep and a lot more difficult to catch than the bass. Lots of sunfish as well to keep the kids busy. Don't forget to hike down to Stubb Falls and go for a swim/slide.
